question_name: Do I need a startup or an idea to join the  Science Discovery Zone (SDZ)?
question_answer: No. The SDZ is a place for people to learn new skills and explore opportunities and we don’t believe that you need a startup to do that.

question_name: Can I join the Science Discovery Zone (SDZ) if I'm not affiliated to Toronto Metropolitan University?
Do I need to have a science background to connect with the Science Discovery Zone(SDZ)?
question_answer: No. We are discipline-agnostic and believe that diverse experiential and educational perspectives allow for some of the best kinds of collaboration.
